title: Benpluto
author: Benpluto
content: Omo the country hard, I no go lie, to make am for this country na die. I don tire to complain, the price of fuel no de reduce at all, we just de lived as if we no de live, this country na wahala full am. People de para because money no de, the government self no even de look our faces, instead they keep embezzlement of public funds for their selfish interests, our politicians de always jakpa when things don hard for the country, and na still dem go come out make we cast our vote when election time come. Perhaps make we hope for the very best because God dey.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Sometimes you go hope say if one government comot and another one enter say you see something new and this na true for other countries but for naija, na the same thing no difference, in fact things go hard more when new government enter. Fuel don become something wey don increase poverty among the people. This fuel situation self don make people dey covert fuel generators to begin use gas. Omo me I still dey look for one side oo, make I see how that one too dey go as them say e dey cheap. Naija , things never dey positive na only negative. Them never arrange palliative but dem remove subsidy. Dem just dey bobo everywhere and that is why people dey kill to enter politics and government because na there the money dey.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.created_time: July 16, 2023, 10:37:45 AMLast edit: July 16, 2023, 10:50:43 AM by Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: Yaqman01 on July 16, 2023, 10:07:37 AMWe know that this subsidy remover is own favor but people no understand, that's why some people just de para any how.People no go gree understand because nobody dey see the benefit of the remover. Abi we never hear say Dem still dey steal crude? Government no dey sincere especially the last administration and this present one that is still contested in court. How can dey hastily remove subsidy without arranging how the man on the street go survive. Na palliative money Dem still dey want go borrow. The thing no good to hear for ear. Na same people fight president Goodluck Jonathan for the same policy even as him provide palliative wey everybody see.

comments.body: The issue with us Naija people be say we too dey greedy and anxious for Naija to get better now na dis kind of things we lack it suppose to have been since when dey go comot dis subsidy of fuel but nobody wan do am now d new president dey start from scratch dats security and fuel aspect even food so e go hard first but Sha na true every president na behave dsame but as dis man wan start now make we hope for the best

comments.author: Noson
comments.body: Nigerian politics wasn't designed to meet the needs of the average man. The idea behind the establishment of democracy may have been to bring general progress to the activities that influence the policies of a nation. However, maybe that idea has been hijacked by greed and desperation. The democratic system of governance has never been productive in the Nigerian political sphere and Africa at large. Until greed is eradicated from the heart of men, nothing will change regardless of whoever becomes the president of Nigeria. This is not about party credibility anymore,  it's about conscience.My people, na so I see this matter o!

comments.body: Quote from: BenplutoI don tire to complain, the price of fuel no de reduce at all, we just de lived as if we no de live, this country na wahala full am I believe our president will not put people into shame base on d way he take enter power which his self no say if dis tin continue citizens will not be happy with him, and he need to solve dis issues of fuel that is affecting d price of commodities in d land. comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: Quote from: Benpluto on July 16, 2023, 02:47:09 AMOmo the country hard, I no go lie, to make am for this country na die. I don tire to complain, the price of fuel no de reduce at all, we just de lived as if we no de live, this country na wahala full am. People de para because money no de, the government self no even de look our faces, instead they keep embezzlement of public funds for their selfish interests, our politicians de always jakpa when things don hard for the country, and na still dem go come out make we cast our vote when election time come. Perhaps make we hope for the very best because God dey.Your last statement says it all “perhaps make we hope for the very best because God dey”. This is a statement many citizens don’t believe in any more. They’ve totally lost hope and confidence in this country to be better again but that’s not how it’s suppose to be. No matter the circumstances and hardship we face in this country, we don’t have any other country asides this and it is we ourselves that can make it become a better and condusive place for us all to live in. Despite the complain and hardship faced by many Nigerians, some people still don’t feel it and they’re still living their normal life, not because they’re not affected but because they’ve lost total dependency on the government and found a way to fend for themselves. These are not political people, but just a patriot Nigerian that have prayed for a better nation day and night but couldn’t help to make himself useful to himself and the family first. We are talented, let’s not wait for the government to intervene first if we have other means of helping ourselves.The country is comfortable to live in if you abide by the rules and regulations and not take part in illegal activities. The cost of living here is still considerable than other countries most of our people run to for a greener pasture. As we continue to pray for a better nation, let’s strive to make ourselves useful for the nation and our family too.

comments.body: Even if you like pray from now till tomorrow this government go make sure say them get all the things then lose for last election before them go rest, that's if them go gree rest oh. comments.body: With the current situation this country dey now e dey pain me enter blood, just see the way things be now for this country nothing dey move forward. The politicians are getting wealthier every day why the citizens are left with nothing. Now just try move around families wey dey eat 3x a day before now na only once even where u suppose pay transportation go u get trek cos of price of fuel  and we go call am exercise. Nna only God fit survive us for this country I no dey look or expect any thing from government I just dey face my job reduce this country pressure from u head

Make we just dey hustle( legit hustling) and we go make am. D current administration don enter and him don commot subsidy already, prices of things just dey increase anyhow but since him just dey enter make we see Wetin him go do,  make we give am time. Because me I still get believe say before things go better for dis country we go see shege first, nobody go just come fix Nigeria easily, things don too spoil pass normal, and one person no fit fix dis country because if president no corrupt and people wey dey under am corrupt nothing go still change, and most people get corrupt mindset now even we youth, na just few of us get clean mind.I no dey even complain about our politicians again, because we sabi d once wey no good and d few once wey good among them, but we still decide to vote for d once wey no good, so na all of us go see shege together now. Election time go reach dey go come dey share small small money give us we go forget all d shege wey we don see we go still vote for them again. Make we wise up make we no dey vote for party again, both pdp, Apc and Lp get better people and bad people for inside, make we dey vote for people and not party.

I believe sae your answer go be no. You see as this our country d so, nothing seems to be alright. Day by day, poverty and hardship d on increase and the government are not doing anything about am. Check out the amount(5 billion naira) wey FG bring out to caution the removal of fuel subsidy for the whole 36 states, make you and I just d look how the sharing formula of the palliative go be. Whether we go get a single penny from am. The huge money wey d FG brought out, go still end for our corrupt politicians hand. At the end, dem go tell us one or two stories of how them share am. And you think sae, for this our country make we hope for the best. Abegy that best of a thing no d happen anytime soon. You better begin to prepare yourself financially for the worst that is about to happen. Na my yarning be this, from me to you. So that you go remove your mind from that of your so-called "hope for the best'' because nothing like that go happen for this Tinubu regime
